slogan_body: Ticket721 leverages web 3.0 technologies to offer highly secured and high-tech digital tickets to its users
description_user_1: buy tickets by using credit card, dai or ethers
description_user_2: store tickets in the offline & secured mobile wallet
description_user_3: use the marketplace to buy or sell tickets
description_organizer_1: configure all the aspects of their events
description_organizer_2: generate new revenue streams from the marketplace
description_organizer_3: get complete insights on the activity of their tickets
